thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com | 3 of 90
thread.title: J
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by J

author: J
title: J
text: I ordered on a Sunday and the product arrived on Thursday. I had two packages which arrived together. Everything I ordered was in the box and undamaged. The installation went smoothly with no issues. The installation instructions were clear but I mainly used them as a guide since I used my own idea for the CB wire routing. I have a 2-door JK and the wire lengths were adequate. I had to paint the antenna mount bolts black to match. Other than that, I'm happy with this kit and company. Thanks.
